Emerging or reemerging viruses pose major public health concerns globally.
40 For several pathogenic viruses, considerable efforts have focused on vaccine development and other therapies, like transfusion of convalescent plasma.
41
,
42 However, during pandemics infected individuals need urgently to be treated on a large scale. A medicine armamentarium for the COVID-19 outbreak is needed immediately and drug repurposing could be one of the best strategies to deal with this pandemic.
43
,
44 Computational and experimental approaches can be used, alone or combined, to achieve a more holistic point of view and increased chance of success in drug repurposing.
